mapper.insert: insert into board(bo_co_num, bo_title, bo_content, bo_me_id) values(#{bo.bo_co_num}, #{bo.bo_title}, #{bo.bo_content}, #{bo.bo_me_id})
insert into file(fi_bo_num, fi_name, fi_ori_name) values(#{fi.fi_bo_num} , #{fi.fi_name} , #{fi.fi_ori_name})
mapper.select: select board.* , co_name as bo_co_name from board join community on bo_co_num= co_num where bo_num=#{num}
mapper.update: update board set bo_view = bo_view + 1 where bo_num=#{num}
